headline: Sherwin-Williams Raises Dividend to 79 Cents, from 71.5 Cents
summary: By Connor Hart Sherwin-Williams increased its dividend 10.5%, to 79 cents. The new payout, equal to $3.19 a year, represents an annual yield of about 0.9% based on Tuesday's closing price of...
